response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for you. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs and aspirations, is priced at $1,200,000. My goal is to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction, and I believe this price offers a fair compromise between its worth and your valuation. I look forward to discussing how we can make this deal happen.", "product_price": 1200000}
